.clearfix:after {visibility: hidden; display: block; font-size: 0; content: " "; clear: both; height: 0; }

* { -moz-box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; }

body {
	background-color: white;
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 1rem;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    color: #333;
    margin: 0px;
    line-height: 1.4rem;
    width: 100%;
}

#wrapper {
    width: 85%;
    max-width: 1024px;
    min-width: 200px;
    margin: 20px auto;
}

nav {
	width: 100%;
	display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 1% 5%;
}


nav ul {
	display: flex;
	width: 40%;
	justify-content: space-between;
	list-style-type: none;
	margin-right: 5%;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
}

nav h1 {
    font-size: 2rem;
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-left: 15px;
}

nav a {
    color: #aa3034;
    text-decoration: none;
}

a:hover 
{
     color: #aa3034; 
     text-decoration:none; 
     cursor:pointer;  
}

.skipNav {
	position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 2;
    color: #663300;
    font-size: 90%;
    background: #ff9900;
    padding: 3px 5px;
    left: -10000px;
    width: 1px;
    height: 1px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.contact {
    display: flex;
}

.contact i {
	background: white;
	font-size: 20px;
	border-radius: 400px;
	padding: 10px;
	margin: 5px;
	transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
	color: grey;
}

.contact:hover i {
	opacity: 0.5;
}

.contact:hover i:hover {
	opacity: 1.0;
}

header {
    padding: 5% 0;
}

h1 {
    font-family: 'Domine', serif;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 4rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0px;
    margin: 0px;
    line-height: 100%;
    /* letter-spacing: 1px; */
}

h1 a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color:#aa3034;
}

h2 {
    margin: 1px auto;
}

h3 {
    font-size: 3rem;
}

.intro {
    text-align: justify;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    padding: 5% 5% 0 5%;

    line-height: 150%;
}

.intro a, .follow a, figcaption a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #aa3034;
}

.email {
    position: relative;
    top: -3px;
}

.intro a:hover, .follow a:hover, figcaption a:hover {
    border-bottom: 1.5px solid #30aaa0;
    /* text-decoration: underline; */
}

.social {
    display: flex;
    padding-left: 4%;
    padding-right: 5%;
	/* transition: all .3s; */
	margin: 15px;
}


.social i {
	background: white;
	font-size: 20px;
	border-radius: 400px;
	padding: 10px;
	margin: 5px;
	transition: all 0.4s ease 0s;
	color: grey;
}

.social a:first-child i {
	padding-left: 0;
	margin-left: 0;
}

.social:hover i {
	opacity: 0.5;
}

.social:hover i:hover {
    opacity: 1.0;
    color: #aa3034;
}

.carto {
    width: 60%;
    text-align: center;
}

.viz_nav, .articles_nav {
    border-top: 1px solid #d3d3d3;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d3d3d3;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 5%;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
}

#articles {
    margin-top: 2%;
}

.viz_wrapper {
    max-width: 1080px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

ul {
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;

}

li {
    width: calc(33% - 10px);
    margin: 5px;
    float: left;
    min-width: 288px;
}

figure {
    position: relative;
    margin: 0;
    /* height: 300px;
    width: 300px;
    -o-object-fit: contain; */
    /* overflow: hidden; */
}

figure img {
    display: block;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}

.link {
    z-index: 1;
    position: absolute;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    opacity: 0;
}

figcaption {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    text-align: center;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.7);
    /* background-color: rgba(217,0,87,0.7); */
    color: white;
    display: none;

}

.caption {
    position: absolute;
    /* top: 5%; */
    padding: 5%;
}

figure:hover figcaption {
    display:block;
}

h4 {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    text-align: center;
}

.extra {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 900px;
}

.source {
    text-align: right;
}

.maps {
    font-family: 'Open-Sans', sans-serif;
}

.images-NYC {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

.NYC {
    max-width: 600px;
}

.follow {
    text-align: center;
}

/* Maps page */

#maincontent {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    text-align: left;
}

.carto {
    width: 60%;
    text-align: center;
}

.descript {
    width: 60%;
    padding-bottom: 4%;
}

.images {
    width: 100%;
}

footer {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 20px;
    border-top: 1px solid #d3d3d3;
    margin-top: 5%;
}

@media (max-width: 900px) {
    .extra {
        max-width: 360px;
    }
}

@media (max-width: 1050px) {
    li {
        width: calc(50% - 10px);
    }
}

@media (max-width: 702px) {

    /* ul {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center
    } */

    ul {
        width: 80%;
        margin: auto;
    }
    
    li {
        width: 100%;
    }
}

    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
	<script>// here we go 
var TxtType = function TxtType(el, toRotate, period) {
  this.toRotate = toRotate;
  this.el = el;
  this.loopNum = 0;
  this.period = parseInt(period, 10) || 2000;
  this.txt = '';
  this.tick();
  this.isDeleting = false;
};

TxtType.prototype.tick = function () {
  var i = this.loopNum % this.toRotate.length;
  var fullTxt = this.toRotate[i];

  if (this.isDeleting) {
    this.txt = fullTxt.substring(0, this.txt.length - 1);
  } else {
    this.txt = fullTxt.substring(0, this.txt.length + 1);
  }

  this.el.innerHTML = '<span class="wrap">' + this.txt + '</span>';
  var that = this;
  var delta = 200 - Math.random() * 100;

  if (this.isDeleting) {
    delta /= 2;
  }

  if (!this.isDeleting && this.txt === fullTxt) {
    delta = this.period;
    this.isDeleting = true;

    if (this.loopNum + 1 === this.toRotate.length) {
      // add this to stop
      return;
    }
  } else if (this.isDeleting && this.txt === '') {
    this.isDeleting = false;
    this.loopNum++;
    delta = 500;
  }

  setTimeout(function () {
    that.tick();
  }, delta);
};

window.onload = function () {
  var elements = document.getElementsByClassName('typewrite');

  for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
    var toRotate = elements[i].getAttribute('data-type');
    var period = elements[i].getAttribute('data-period');

    if (toRotate) {
      new TxtType(elements[i], JSON.parse(toRotate), period);
    }
  } // INJECT CSS


  var css = document.createElement("style");
  css.type = "text/css";
  css.innerHTML = ".typewrite > .wrap { border-right: 0.08em solid #fff}";
  document.body.appendChild(css);
};</script>
